basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HCV NS3 helicase protein)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.18479669]Hepatitis C virus (HCV):inhibition of HCV helicase activity(IC50=34.6±3.2 μM);West Nile virus (WNV):inhibition of WNV helicase activity(IC50=106±6.1 μM);Japanese encephalitis virus (JEV):inhibition of JEV helicase activity(IC50=322±9.7 μM).
